author: Willem Marx
title: Trump move to end WHO funding would be 'catastrophic' for polio programs, experts warn
description: President Donald Trump's move to halt funding to the World Health Organization would be catastrophic for polio programs around the world, experts say.
content:
If President Donald Trump carries out his threat to pull American funding for the World Health Organization, the impact on polio eradication efforts around the world could be catastrophic, experts told NBC News on Wednesday.
Its heartbreaking, said Dr. Jack … [+4468 chars]
